程序包 org.openintents.tools.simulator.controller

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AllSensorsController
    The controller of the view that allows you to select the enabled sensors.
    DeviceController
    This class controls the mobile device (visual representation for the orientation sensor).
    SensorSimulatorController
    SensorSimulatorController keeps the behaviour of the SensorSimulator (listeners, timers, etc.)
    SensorsScenarioController
    Scenario controller manage the interaction between scenario model, scenario view and sensor simulator controller.
    StateControllerBig
    Controller of a state in detailed view.
    StateControllerSmall
    Controller of a state from the scenario grid.
    TelnetSimulatorController
    TelnetSimulatorController keeps the behaviour of the TelnetSimulator (listeners, etc.)
